item.title: My Thesis
item.description: Coming up with an Interesting Thesis Project is not easy at all. Actually I had 3 different projets and 5 different professors. None of them were really interested in my propositions. Thank God I found Dr. Marcos Valdebenito. He is really interested in Reliability Analysis in Structures and Study the Response of Random Field Variables into Strutures, you can learn more about his work on his website. Once I talked to him about I was doing in my former job he was really interested in applying Machine Learning techniques to solve this kind of problems.

item.title: The Stiffness Method
item.description: The Method The Problem Rcpp Basics Creating an Rcpp file Stiffness Method Stiff Matrix by Element Active DoF Assembly Connectivity Array Stiffness Matrix Assembly Load Vector Assembly Solving the Problem Conclusions The Method The Rayleigh Ritz Method is nothing but applying Finite Elements to Structural problems. Basically you split your structure into smaller structures that can easily be solved By solving, I mean, Calculate the specific stifness of the Structure in order to determine how the loads affects the structure.

item.title: My Final Project at the ML Diploma (Part III)
item.description: 1 Tidymodels 1.1 Spliting the Data 1.2 Pre Processing 2 Create the Logistic Regression 3 Conclusions Now we have an idea on how the data looks like it is time to Model. 1 Tidymodels I´m a huge fan of tidymodels framework and the way Max Kuhn has put together all of this system. I´ll be using several packages from this framework in order to show different steps of the Machine Learning Process.

item.title: My Final Project at the ML Diploma (Part II)
item.description: 1 Checking Numerical Distribution 2 Checking Categorical Variables 3 Chi-Square Test 4 Conclusion Last time we conducted a high level cleansing of the data. Now it´s time to understand what is going on in it. In order to do that we´ll use a lot ggplot to visualize the data. 1 Checking Numerical Distribution In order to do this I should pick Numerical Variables one by one and create a ggplot.

item.title: My Final Project at the ML Diploma (Part I)
item.description: 1 Importing Data 2 Redefining Categorical Variables 3 Discovering Missing Values 4 Conclusion During my Machine Learning Diploma I had the chance to work on a very interesting project that was actually created in SAS. Of course I absolutely refused to use that old fashioned tool and I move everything to R. I will try to demonstrate as much of the packages I used to perform this analysis.

item.title: Propuesta Redes Convolucionales
item.description: Redes Convolucionales ¿Cómo se relaciona esto con las Redes Convolucionales? ¿Cómo se va especializando la red para ser cada vez más detallista? ¿Cómo se relaciona este problema con Estructuras? El Paper de Finol Solución Puntos Interesantes para la Investigación. 1era Sugerencia (Quizás no para la Memoria, pero para seguir investigando) 2da Sugerencia 3era Sugerencia. 4ta Sugerencia “Crear Imágenes Estructurales” Redes Convolucionales Las redes convolucionales es un tipo de Red que esta especializada principalmente en extraer características de imágenes.

item.title: Activation Functions
item.description: Activation Functions Identity Step Function Linear Function Sigmoid Function Hyperbolic Tangent ReLU Leaky ReLU Softmax How to choose the perfect Activation function? Activation Functions Activation functions are one of the most important characteristic of ANN. They basically decide whether a neuron should be activated or not. When a particular threshold is reached the Neuron will fire, meaning they will transmit the input signal to the next layer of the Network.

item.title: Intro to Neural Networks
item.description: What is an Artificial Neural Network? Basic Structure What Problems can Neural Networks solve? Classification Regression Typical Problems solved with Neural Networks Conclusion What is an Artificial Neural Network? The Picture you see up there is far a way from what a real Neural Network looks like: Actually it is more similar to something like this: Figure 1: Multi-Layer Perceptron The configuration showed above is nothing but a visual representation of serial Matrix Multiplications.
